summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Public Health Department; authorizing an agreement with the Department of Human Resources for financial assistance for the operation of a model nurse clinic program, establishing certain positions in said Department, increasing certain expenditure allowances by reappropriation and transfer within the 1977 Budget of the Public Health Department, authorizing the charging and collection of fees for health and counseling services, and making a reimbursable appropriation from the Emergency Fund and declaring the emergency therefor.
committee: Human Resources and Operations and Finance
